pokemon.name: Long Rest Spell Invocations
pokemon.snipit: A blonde halfling darts around the corner, nimbly avoiding the sentry's notice. With a quick whisper to his fey patron, magical luck seeps out of him as an offering and in return fuels is magic. After a breif moment, the sentry yelps and leaps from his chair, darting towards the nearest bathroom. Gibby can feel his own luck being pressed, but he'll take anothers misfortune at the moment to progress towards the soon to be ill-gotten gains.
